dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Library to implement a well-behaved Unix daemon process. This library
implements the well-behaved daemon specification of PEP Standard daemon
process. A well-behaved Unix daemon process is tricky to get right, but
the required steps are much the same for every daemon program. A
DaemonContext instance holds the behaviour and configured process
environment for the program; use the instance as a context manager to
enter a daemon state.
dependencies.name: py-python-daemon

dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.
dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.
dependencies.name: py-tornado

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:

remote targets, and environment
dependent_to.name: py-law

description: Workflow mgmgt + task scheduling + dependency resolution
name: py-luigi
